report.title: A list of images for event reporting
report.description: Designed for fast reporting on events like bioblitzes with a simple survey/date filter.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrence_images oi on oi.occurrence_id=o.id and oi.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.survey_id=#survey_id# AND o.date_start>='#date_from#' AND o.date_start<='#date_to#' AND o.record_status<>'R' AND o.training=false

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || o.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: formatted
column.sql:
CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then '' || o.preferred_taxon || '' ELSE '' || o.preferred_taxon || '' || COALESCE('
' || o.default_common_name, '') END
